body.raw:
## What's Changed
* remove async by @anarchyologist in https://github.com/exakty/VeraAPI/pull/354
* add exception by @anarchyologist in https://github.com/exakty/VeraAPI/pull/355


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/exakty/VeraAPI/compare/v1.3.47...v1.3.48
